body: These goggles, constructed of a pair of perfect prisms held in place by golden frames and affixed to the head by a black leather strap, grants the wearer true seeing continuously. Furthermore, once per day on command, the wearer can use analyze dweomer as the spell.
name: Truesight Goggles
